snippet: A slide show of readers' favorite moments from the herky-jerky journey through the streets of Manhattan offered in the experimental filmmaker Hollis Frampton's 1968 opus "Surface Tension."
abstract: A slide show of readers' favorite moments from the herky-jerky journey through the streets of Manhattan offered in the experimental filmmaker Hollis Frampton's 1968 opus "Surface Tension."

headline.main: Your Favorite Moments From 1968 New York
